CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: First US Bancshares Inc is a bank holding company. The Bank conducts a general commercial banking business and offers banking services such as demand, savings, individual retirement account and time deposits, personal and commercial loans, safe deposit box services and remote deposit capture. The Bank provides a range of commercial banking services to small and medium-sized businesses, property managers, business executives, professionals and other individuals. The Bank has two reportable operating segments namely the Bank and Acceptance Loan Company. The majority of the revenue is generated through interest earned on financial instruments, including loans and investment securities.

value.name: Phillip R. Wheat
